short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables users to create flashcards for language learning using youtube videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables the Memcasa users to add flashcards with embedded youtube videos to their Memcasa decks directly from a youtube video's transcript.
